author: Joe Flint
title: CBS CEO Moonves Had 2017 Compensation of $69.3 Million
text:
CBS Corp. disclosed that Chief Executive Leslie Moonves received total compensation of $69.3 million in 2017 and announced the nomination of former Time Warner Inc. Chairman Richard Parsons to its board of directors.

One of the highest paid CEOs in the U.S., Mr. Moonves saw his compensation package dip slightly from the $69.6 million value of his 2016 pay, according to the companyâ€™s proxy statement on Friday. He received a $20 million bonus and $3.5 million in salary in 2017. Mr. Moonves also received $43.7 million in stock...
